history.proof: intros net h d ps H. shelve.

exceptions.tactic: intros client id i net h d ps H.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
orig_base_params: BaseParams
one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params
oiai: output_implies_applied_interface
client: clientId
id: nat
i: input

Goal:
forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) (h : name) (d : data) (ps : list packet), applied_implies_input_state client id i {| nwPackets := ps; nwState := update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d |} -> exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ (In e (log d) \/ (exists h0 : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h0))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (es : list entry), In p ps /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some es /\ In e es))

Premises:
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record packet (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkPacket { pSrc : Net.name; pDst : Net.name; pBody : Net.msg } Arguments packet {P params} Arguments mkPacket {P params}
pBody = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (p : packet) => let (_, _, pBody) := p in pBody : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), packet -> Net.msg Arguments pBody {P params}
Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
data = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (data, _, _) := BaseParams0 in data : BaseParams -> Type Arguments data {BaseParams}
Record output_implies_applied_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_output_implies_applied_interface { output_implies_applied : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> key_in_output_trace client id tr -> in_applied_entries client id net } Arguments output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_output_implies_applied_interface {orig_base_params one_node
clientId = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (RaftParams0 : RaftParams orig_base_params) => let (_, _, _, clientId, _) := RaftParams0 in clientId : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments clientId {orig_base_params RaftParams}
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
Record RaftParams (orig_base_params : BaseParams) : Type := Build_RaftParams { N : nat; input_eq_dec : forall x y : input, {x = y} + {x <> y}; output_eq_dec : forall x y : output, {x = y} + {x <> y}; clientId : Type; clientId_eq_dec : forall x y : clientId, {x = y} + {x <> y} } Arguments Build_RaftParams _ _%nat_scope (_ _)%function_scope [clientId]%type_scope _%function_scope
nwPackets = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (nwPackets, _) := n in nwPackets : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> list packet Arguments nwPackets {P params}
nwState = fun (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) (n : network) => let (_, nwState) := n in nwState : forall (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P), network -> Net.name -> data Arguments nwState {P params}
Record entry (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Type := mkEntry { eAt : name; eClient : clientId; eId : nat; eIndex : logIndex; eTerm : term; eInput : input } Arguments entry {orig_base_params raft_params} Arguments mkEntry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _ _%nat_scope
applied_implies_input_state = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (net : network) => exists e : entry, correct_entry client id i e /\ ((exists h : Net.name, In e (log (nwState net h))) \/ (exists (p : packet) (entries : list entry), In p (nwPackets net) /\ mEntries (pBody p) = Some entries /\ In e entries)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params
Record network (P : BaseParams) (params : MultiParams P) : Type := mkNetwork { nwPackets : list packet; nwState : Net.name -> data } Arguments network {P params} Arguments mkNetwork {P params} _%list_scope _%function_scope
name = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) => fin N : forall orig_base_params : BaseParams, RaftParams orig_base_params -> Type Arguments name {orig_base_params raft_params}
input = fun BaseParams0 : BaseParams => let (_, input, _) := BaseParams0 in input : BaseParams -> Type Arguments input {BaseParams}
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
mEntries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (p : msg) => match p with | AppendEntries _ _ _ _ entries _ => Some entries | _ => None end : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), msg -> option (list entry) Arguments mEntries {orig_base_params raft_params}
In : forall A : Type, A -> list A -> Prop
update : (forall x y : ?A, {x = y} + {x <> y}) -> (?A -> ?B) -> ?A -> ?B -> ?A -> ?B where ?A : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- Type] ?B : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- Type]
Notation log := (RaftState.log term name entry logIndex serverType data clientId output)
Inductive option (A : Type) : Type := Some : A -> option A | None : option A Arguments option _%type_scope Arguments Some {A}%type_scope a : rename Arguments None {A}%type_scope
correct_entry = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (i : input) (e : entry) => eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ eInput e = i : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> input -> entry -> Prop Arguments correct_entry {orig_base_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}
handleClientRequest_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> ps = [] /\ (log st' = log st \/ (exists e : entry, log st' = e :: log st /\ eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log st)) /\ eTerm e = currentTerm st /\ eClient e = client /\ eInput e = c /\ eId e = id /\ type st = Leader))
haveNewEntries_true : forall (st : raft_data) (es : list entry), haveNewEntries st es = true -> es <> [] /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> maxTerm es))
handleAppendEntries_log_detailed : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> commitIndex st' = commitIndex st /\ log st' = log st \/ leaderId st' <> None /\ currentTerm st' = t /\ commitIndex st' = Init.Nat.max (commitIndex st) (Init.Nat.min ci (maxIndex es)) /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ t >= currentTerm st /\ log st' = es /\ (findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = None \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) (maxIndex es) = Some e /\ eTerm e <> max...
in_applied_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (net : network) => exists e : entry, eClient e = client /\ eId e = id /\ In e (applied_entries (nwState net)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), clientId -> nat -> network -> Prop Arguments in_applied_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _ _%nat_scope
handleAppendEntries_log : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex) (st' : raft_data) (ps : msg), handleAppendEntries h st t n pli plt es ci = (st', ps) -> log st' = log st \/ currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli = 0 /\ log st' = es \/ (currentTerm st <= t /\ es <> [] /\ pli <> 0 /\ (exists e : entry, In e (log st) /\ eIndex e = pli /\ eTerm e = plt)) /\ log st' = es ++ removeAfterIndex (log st) pli
findAtIndex_elim : forall (l : list entry) (i : logIndex) (e : entry), findAtIndex l i = Some e -> i = eIndex e /\ In e l
Build_applied_implies_input_interface : (forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr) -> applied_implies_input_interface
Record applied_implies_input_interface (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : Prop := Build_applied_implies_input_interface { applied_implies_input : forall (client : clientId) (id : nat) (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (tr : list (Net.name * (input + list output))) (e : entry), step_failure_star step_failure_init (failed, net) tr -> eClient e = client -> eId e = id -> applied_implies_input_state client id (eInput e) net -> in_input_trace client id (eInput e) tr } Arguments applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} Arguments Build_applied_implies_input_interface {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
doLeader_messages : forall (st : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (m : name * msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), doLeader st h = (os, st', ms) -> In m ms -> snd m = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> t = currentTerm st /\ log st' = log st /\ type st = Leader /\ (plt = 0 \/ (exists e : entry, findAtIndex (log st) pli = Some e /\ eTerm e = plt))

handleClientRequest_log_ind : handleClientRequest ?h ?st ?client ?id ?c = (?out, ?st', ?ps) -> forall P : list entry -> Prop, P (log ?st) -> (forall e : entry, eIndex e = S (maxIndex (log ?st)) -> eTerm e = currentTerm ?st -> eClient e = ?client -> eInput e = ?c -> eId e = ?id -> type ?st = Leader -> P (e :: log ?st)) -> P (log ?st') where ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- name] ?st : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_impl...
raft_net_invariant_client_request = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (h : name) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input), handleClientRequest h (nwState net h) client id c = (out, d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_client_request {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
handleClientRequest_matchIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> maxIndex (log st') = maxIndex (log st) /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st \/ matchIndex st' = assoc_set name_eq_dec (matchIndex st) h (maxIndex (log st')) /\ maxIndex (log st') = S (maxIndex (log st))
handleClientRequest_matchIndex_maxIndex : forall (h : name) (st : raft_data) (client : clientId) (id : nat) (c : input) (out : list raft_output) (st' : raft_data) (ps : list (name * msg)), handleClientRequest h st client id c = (out, st', ps) -> maxIndex (log st') = maxIndex (log st) /\ matchIndex st' = matchIndex st \/ assoc_default name_eq_dec (matchIndex st') h 0 = maxIndex (log st')
handleAppendEntries_log_ind : handleAppendEntries ?h ?st ?t ?n ?pli ?plt ?es ?ci = (?st', ?ps) -> forall P : list entry -> Prop, P (log ?st) -> (?pli = 0 -> P ?es) -> (forall e : entry, ?pli <> 0 -> In e (log ?st) -> eIndex e = ?pli -> eTerm e = ?plt -> P (?es ++ removeAfterIndex (log ?st) ?pli)) -> P (log ?st') where ?h : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oiai : output_implies_applied_interface client : clientId id : nat i : input |- name] ?st : [orig_base_params : BaseParams one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params oia...
commit_recorded = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (net : network) (h : Net.name) (e : entry) => In e (log (nwState net h)) /\ (eIndex e <= lastApplied (nwState net h) \/ eIndex e <= commitIndex (nwState net h)) : forall (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params), network -> Net.name -> entry -> Prop Arguments commit_recorded {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params}
RIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) -> (forall p' : packet, In p' ps' -> In p' (xs ++ ys) \/ In p' (send_packets (pDst p) l)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_intermediate_reachable_ind : forall P : network -> Prop, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
raft_intermediate_reachable_sind : forall P : network -> SProp, P step_async_init -> (forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> P net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> P net') ->...-> P n
step_failure_ind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
step_failure_sind : forall P : list Net.name * network -> list Net.name * network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) ->...-> P p p0 l
Inductive raft_intermediate_reachable (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) : network -> Prop := RIR_init : raft_intermediate_reachable step_async_init | RIR_step_failure : forall (failed : list Net.name) (net : network) (failed' : list Net.name) (net' : network) (out : list (Net.name * (input + list output))), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed', net') out -> raft_intermediate_reachable net' | RIR_handleInput : forall (net : network) (h : name) (inp : raft_input) (out : list raft_output) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)) (ps' : list packet) (st' : name -> data), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleInput h inp (nw...
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
raft_net_invariant_append_entries = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : term) (n : name) (pli : logIndex) (plt : term) (es : list entry) (ci : logIndex), handleAppendEntries (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t n pli plt es ci = (d, m) -> pBody p = AppendEntries t n pli plt es ci -> P net ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_append_entries {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_do_leader = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (h : name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), doLeader d h = (os, d', ms) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwState net h = d -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_do_leader {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) (pSrc p) t v = d -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_net_invariant_request_vote = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (m : msg) (t : nat) (cid : name) (lli llt : nat), handleRequestVote (pDst p) (nwState net (pDst p)) t (pSrc p) lli llt = (d, m) -> pBody p = RequestVote t cid lli llt -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys ->...-> Prop Arguments raft_net_invariant_request_vote {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
step_dup_ind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> Prop, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l
RIR_doGenericServer : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)) (h : name), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doGenericServer h (nwState net h) = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
RIR_doLeader : forall (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (h : Net.name) (os : list raft_output) (d' : raft_data) (ms : list (name * msg)), raft_intermediate_reachable net -> doLeader (nwState net h) h = (os, d', ms) -> (forall h' : name, st' h' = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) h d' h') -> (forall p : packet, In p ps' -> In p (nwPackets net) \/ In p (send_packets h ms)) -> raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

step_drop_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l

intros client id i net h d ps H.
destruct H as [e [He [Hin | [h0 [Hin | [p [es [Hin [HmEntries Hin_e]]]]]]]].
- exists e. split. apply He. left. apply Hin.
- exists e. split. apply He. right. left. exists h0. apply Hin.
- exists e. split. apply He. right. right. exists p, es. auto.
